event.title: CommitCon: Git and Open Source
event.description:
> Have you ever wondered, how thousands of developers work and manage a large codebase?    

That's why, IET NITK plans to hold global KEP for Git and Open Source, chaired by **Rajan Jaiswal (GSoC 2021 with CCExtractor)**, Aniket Srivatsava, Ashish Janaswamy, and Snehith Bhagavan. The event would span for three days, and we would hold a 1.5 hours Youtube Live every day from 6th to 9th June. 

Git is designed to provide a complete knowledge of the version control system and its importance in the development life cycle, how it can be efficiently used to manage large codebases

![CommitCon Theme Poster](https://res.cloudinary.com/iet-nitk/image/upload/v1622881943/Whats_App_Image_2021_06_05_at_11_45_45_AM_8be6d4de3f.jpg)

----

#### Event Record
##### Session 1
- **6th July, 6PM on Youtube Live**
- Gist: A basic overview on version control systems and Git
##### Session 2
- A medium-level dive into Git and Git commands. We'll cover the most commonly used Git commands here, as well as an introduction to GitHub.
##### Session 3
- Anyone can learn Git easily, but as developers, you need to be better than most. This session will focus on advanced Git concepts
##### Session 4
- Now that you're good with Git, you should look around on exciting GitHub Open Source projects that make a difference.

#### Okay, where will this happen?
Quite simple. We'll be having our sessions on Youtube Live at our [official Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK). The resources and repositories will also be shared here. So stay tuned on this page as well.

#### Important Links
- Youtube Page: [https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK](https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK)
- GitHub Organization Repository: [https://github.com/ietnitk](https://github.com/ietnitk)
